name: SPACEX
description: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft.
sampleDescriptions: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act of 2018 (H.R. 5503):  Issues related to commercial, civil and defense space transportation.
